jelly_membrane.name: Jelly Membrane
jelly_membrane.desc: A thin membrane that projects an energy field and somewhat repairs the ship.

jelly_bell.name: Jelly Bell
jelly_bell.desc: The glowing membrane of a moon jelly. Regenerates very fast and somewhat repairs the ship.

jelly_umbrella.name: Jelly Umbrella
jelly_umbrella.desc: Thick membrane found on bulbous jellies. Very protective, but not very fast at regenerating. Gradually repairs the ship.

jelly_warbell.name: Jelly Warbell
jelly_warbell.desc: Abnormal jelly membrane that is very good at taking hits and regenerating itself. Gradually repairs the ship.

sting_small.name: Small Sting
sting_small.desc: A little stinging tentacle. Not very accurate, but can certainly hurt.

sting_moon.name: Moon Sting
sting_moon.desc: The glowing tentacle of a moon jelly. Very pretty and surprisingly fast.

stinging_needle.name: Stinging Needle
stinging_needle.desc: Sharp needle used to deliver the poison of a jelly. Very inaccurate.

nettle_sacs.name: Nettle Sacs
nettle_sacs.desc: Sac of jelly poison that seeks targets and can take a few hits from point defense.
